      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(java.lang.String username,
                       javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext context)
        Method to verify whether the username is valid using the method validateEmail().
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<ValidEmail,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        username, - username entered in the user creation form to check for validation.
        context, - context in which the constraint is evaluated.
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the username is valid, false otherwise.

      • validateEmail

        private boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Method to verify whether an email has the right pattern.
        Parameters:
        email, - email entered in the user creation form to check for validation.
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the email pattern is respected, false otherwise.
